column2: Base class for all actions. Provides default implementations for update() and stop() that handle common functionality like pause state, elapsed time tracking, and completion callbacks. Only start() must be implemented by subclasses.
column3: Use to define custom behaviors over time. Override start() for initialization, optionally extend update() and stop() for custom behavior while maintaining base functionality through super() calls.
column4: Create a custom action by inheriting from Action and implementing start(). Extend update() and stop() only if additional behavior is needed beyond the base implementation.

column3: Use for effects that complete instantly

column2: Applies an action to all sprites in a sprite list
Base class for continuous movement actions
Move the sprite to a specific position over time
